0.5.name: wordpress/bbpress-antispam
0.5.description:
bbPress Antispam for bbPress 2.x is inspired on Antispam Bee and working similar. No data is send outside your blog.

Spam detection features * A CSS hack is made * DNSBL Servers will checked for known spammers * Referrer will checked * The posted content will compared with existing spam
